translation.Name: Audio Tape (Mike Crusader #1)
translation.Description:
An audio tape diary.
Inspect To Play Audio Recording

"With this lab being in a cave, we may need some tools to mine it out for future expansions down the line. I might be able to make a device that creates condensed explosions for maximum speed and precision. Would it be possible to do that? To condense an entire explosion to work like the jet setting on a hose nozzle, for laser precision cutting? Weâ€™ll find out soon!"
